{"step_by_step_thinking": "The pain pathway from teeth and temperature is transmitted via the trigeminal nerve, as mentioned in Document [0]. The trigeminal nerve is not part of the options given. However, the spinothalamic tract is known to carry pain and temperature sensations from the body to the brain. The lateral spinothalamic tract specifically carries pain and temperature sensations.
